about_the_game:
This is the MP3 file of the only BGM in this game.

File name: Rica.mp3

How to find it:
Find R.I.C.A in your Steam library and right click it, select property, and go to local files tab, and see local files.
The computer will automatically open the local files for you and you can find a folder called R.I.C.A - Original BGM and double click that folder, and WOW, the MP3 file is in it!!!!!

Hope you guys will love it, this is the BGM starts at the very beginning of this game, you also will hear it when you get to the true ending.

That's it, just a small music file.
